All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DataSourceConfig
Configuration class responsible for setting up the application's connection to the MySQL database.
DbConfig
Utility class for retrieving MySQL database configuration settings from user input at runtime.
horrorMovie
 
HorrorMovieRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing HorrorMovieSQL entities.
HorrorMovieSQL
Entity class representing a horror movie record stored in the SQL database.
MovieController
Spring MVC controller for handling user interactions related to horror movies.
slasherStatsApp
 
SlasherStatsApplication
Main class and entry point for the SlasherStats Spring Boot application.
slasherStatsManager
Constructor for injecting a HorrorMovieRepository instance.
slasherStatsTests
Unit tests for the slasherStatsManager service using mocked HorrorMovieRepository.
